fields.name: Pure mathematics
fields.description: Maths with no immediate application.

fields.name: Numeracy
fields.description: Basic arithmetic and number handling.

fields.name: Statistics
fields.description: Collection, analysis, interpretation, presentation, and organization of data.

fields.name: Geometry
fields.description: The study of shape and proportion.

fields.name: Applied Mathematics
fields.description: Mathematical topics with applications to the real world.

fields.name: Arithmetic
fields.description: Calculation involving numbers.

fields.name: Numerical reasoning
fields.description: Making decisions based on quantitative data.

fields.name: Hypothesis testing
fields.description: Quantifying the evidence for and against hypotheses about data.

fields.name: Calculus
fields.description: The study of change.

fields.name: Algebra
fields.description: Expressions in unknown variables.

fields.name: Proof
fields.description: Rigorous argument to prove a proposition.

fields.name: Data presentation
fields.description: Diagrams and text to convey statistical information about data.

fields.name: Regression and correlation
fields.description: How two or more variables relate to each other.

fields.name: Distributions
fields.description: The set of possible outcomes of an experiment.

fields.name: Matrices
fields.description: Arrays of numbers.

fields.name: Trigonometry
fields.description: Relationships involving angles and lengths of triangles.

fields.name: Plane geometry
fields.description: Geometry in the 2-dimensional plane.

fields.name: Vectors
fields.description: An object with a direction and a length.

fields.name: Differentiation
fields.description: Determining the rate of change of a function.

fields.name: Integration
fields.description: The inverse process to differentiation.

fields.name: Decimal numbers
fields.description: Handling and writing numbers in decimal format.

fields.name: Mechanics
fields.description: The study of physical laws describing the motion of bodies.

fields.name: Fluid dynamics
fields.description: The study of the behaviour of fluids.

fields.name: Coding theory
fields.description: Codes used for cryptography, communication and data compression.

fields.name: Working with integers
fields.description: Handling whole numbers

fields.name: Collecting, interpreting and representing data
fields.description: Populations and samples, tables and charts.

fields.name: Summary statistics
fields.description: Mean, mode, median, etc.
